unnormalised: Real estate prices in Mumbai continue to skyrocket! A new listing at 12, Bandra West, Mumbai - 400050, boasts a sea-facing apartment for ₹15 Cr. That's right, 15 crore! The property, located near Lilavati Hospital, is a 3BHK flat covering an area of approx. 1800 sq ft.
normalised: Real estate prices in Mumbai continue to skyrocket! A new listing at twelve, Bandra West, Mumbai - four hundred thousand and fifty, boasts a sea-facing apartment for rupee fifteen crore. That's right, fifteen crore! The property, located near Lilavati Hospital, is a three B-H-K flat covering an area of approximately one thousand eight hundred square feet.

unnormalised: Property dealers are saying the location is key. Being in a prime area such as Bandra West near the famous Mount Mary Church makes this a super investment for NRIs or high-net-worth individuals. Amenities include 24/7 security, a swimming pool on the rooftop, and covered parking for 2 cars. Plus, it's just a 10-minute drive from BKC.

unnormalised: "It's a steal at that price!" exclaimed Mr. Sharma from XYZ Realty, 78, Linking Road, Bandra, 400050. He added that similar properties in the area are fetching even higher prices. He anticipates a quick sale given the current market trend. Interested buyers are urged to contact XYZ Realty ASAP.
